Name: Miho Adventures
About the game: Miho adventures is a platformer pixel game where you control Miho in an adventure across an island filled with monsters and enemies of all kinds. Defeat all of them and make them submit to you as their master. The game contains: 32 levels (4 bosses) 12 unlockable images 5 different outfits 1 H animation for each enemy
